# Sample Briefing for Testing

## Objective
Create a simple utility function for string manipulation.

## Requirements
- Function should trim whitespace from beginning and end
- Function should normalize line endings (convert \r\n to \n)
- Return empty string for null/undefined input
- Handle unicode characters properly

## Constraints
- Pure TypeScript implementation
- No external dependencies
- Must include comprehensive unit tests
- Maximum file size: 200 lines

## Expected Output
- `src/utils/string-utils.ts` - main implementation
- `tests/string-utils.test.ts` - unit tests
